subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Otule’s put-back dunk gave host Marquette a 1-point lead with 1 minutes 23 seconds to play Saturday, and the Golden Eagles held on for a 79-74 victory over West Virginia.
snippet: Chris Otule’s put-back dunk gave host Marquette a 1-point lead with 1 minutes 23 seconds to play Saturday, and the Golden Eagles held on for a 79-74 victory over West Virginia.
